itemInfo.itemDesc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be also be obtained by Chopping Pine Timber.

item.name: Pine Timber
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Serendia Shrine and Marie Cave. It can be also be obtained by Lumbering Pine Trees.

item.name: Pine Plywood
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be also be obtained by Chopping Pine Timber. It requires the knowledge of Chopping: Beginner.

※ Find Lebyos in Heidel and complete the Working the Ash Tree Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.
